name: MUTTER & KRUCHEN Partnerschaft von Rechtsanwälten mbB
goal: The firm's legal consulting practice is focusing on high level advice on complex German corporate and securities law for German listed companies, mid cap and family-owned companies (Mittelstand) and major stakeholders as well as start ups. We also handle M&A for our clients.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
euInitiatives:
EU Company law upgraded: Rules on digital solutions and efficient cross-border operations
EU Company law package
